sentences.english: And, of course, the research into pain continues.
sentences.chinese: 當然，對痛苦的研究仍在繼續。

sentences.english: 'We are still ironing out the bugs in the system,' said Dr. Lamont.
sentences.chinese: 拉蒙特說，我們仍在消除系統中的小故障。

sentences.english: Heidi Thmas:150 years after Cranford was written, we're all still here.
sentences.chinese: 克蘭福德寫成後的150年，我們仍在這裏。

sentences.english: Significant micro- and macro-adjustments are in the works.
sentences.chinese: 微觀面和宏觀面的重大調整仍在進行之中。

sentences.english: The people, however, continued to sacrifice at the high places, but only to the Lord their God.
sentences.chinese: 百姓卻仍在丘壇上獻祭，只獻給耶和華他們的神。

sentences.english: However, the accumulative concentrations of DDT and BHC in 1998 was much higher than that of some foreign countries.
sentences.chinese: 但1998年的蓄積水平與國外相比仍處於較高水平。

sentences.english: When the police arrived, they sent Chen to hospital. After intensive rescue, Chen is still in coma.
sentences.chinese: 經醫院搶救，陳勇軍目前仍處於昏迷之中。

sentences.english: All of this work is still highly classified.
sentences.chinese: 所有這些工作仍是高度機密。

sentences.english: But some experts cautioned that the science in the study is still very early.
sentences.chinese: 但有些專家申飭說，研究的學科仍在初期。

sentences.english: But Jesus made no reply, not even to a single charge--to the great amazement of the governor.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌仍不回答，連一句話也不說，以致巡撫甚覺希奇。

sentences.english: Yang is still looking for a book publisher.
sentences.chinese: 目前，楊雅晴仍在尋找書的出版商。

sentences.english: For all its troubles, it seems that the US is still the real Middle Kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 儘管危機重重，美國似乎仍是真正的“中央王國”。

sentences.english: The team found the sense of ownership still occurred when participants' fingers were anaesthetized.
sentences.chinese: 研究人員發現當受試者的手指被麻醉時，仍有感知。

sentences.english: We must remain serene and calm, we have wasted points, but the race continues.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須保持平常心，我們丟分了，但競賽仍在繼續。

sentences.english: Still, the issue James raised back in 1905 remains pertinent.
sentences.chinese: 然而詹姆斯在1905年提出的主題然仍值得討論。

sentences.english: And he answered him to never a word; insomuch that the governor marvelled greatly.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌仍不回答，連一句話也不說，以致巡撫甚覺希奇。

definition: despite/although/even though/in spite of/unhesitatingly/do not hesitate (to ask, complain etc)/(go ahead and do it) without hesitating
to continue/to proceed with/to go on with
and/moreover/yet/for the time being/to be about to/both (... and...)
straight (in a straight line)/continuously/always/from the beginning of ... up to .../all along
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
